I can not believe no one is posting anything about this.
 http://www.gnn.tv/headlines/8737/Bush_Impeachment_The_Illinois_State_Legislature_is_Preparing_to_Drop_a_Bombshe
 Illnois is about to force the house of representitives, using Jeffersons rules, to force the house to impeach the president. California, Vermont and several other states are looking into also passing joint resolutions.

I still can't believe that no one has jumpped on this topic. I thought all you Bush fantics would be foaming at the mouth about this. That a state can force the House to impeach the president. It would be a privledged bill, no less, under house rules.

Um . . . I think you need to reread the 'article'. The most they can do (according the article) is get the House to take up the issue (if this is even legit). Do you seriously believe the Republican controlled congress is going to impeach Bush?
 
 What the heck kind of news sites are you reading, anyway? The Guerilla News Network??? LOL

I thought you might like this site Matthew. Actually, I'm sure quite a few people here wold like it
 http://www.itmfa.com/
 I think it was created by Dan Savage of Savage Love, but I'm not sure. That's where I first heard about it at least. Enjoy.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  The forced impeachment of Bush
